i-homologous: Ama-Chromosome afanayo ngokubukeka futhi aphethe izakhi zofuzo zezici ezifanayo
i-meiosis: Inqubo yokuhlukaniswa kwamaseli ekhiqiza ama-gametes (isidoda neqanda) nengxenye yenani lama-chromosome njengeseli lomzali
i-mitosis: Inqubo yokuhlukanisa amaseli ekhiqiza amaseli amasha anenani elifanayo lama-chromosome njengeseli lomzali
i-karyotyping: Ukuhlaziya ama-chromosome omuntu ukuze kutholakale okungavamile
i-phenotype: Izici eziphawulekayo zezinto eziphilayo, ezinqunywa kokubili i-genotype nendawo ezungezile
obusayo: I-allele evala imiphumela ye-allele ephindaphindayo uma ikhona ku-chromosome efanayo
ngokwedlulele: I-allele embozwa i-allele enamandla uma ikhona ku-chromosome efanayo
i-punnett square: Umdwebo osetshenziselwa ukubikezela amathuba okuba inzalo izuze njengefa izici ezithile
i-biotechnology: Ukusetshenziswa kwezinto eziphilayo noma imikhiqizo yazo ukulungisa noma ukudala imikhiqizo emisha noma izinqubo
gmo: Isifinyezo esinikezwe izinto eziphilayo ezikwakheka kwazo kofuzo kushintshwe ngendlela engenzeki ngokwemvelo.
ama-antibiotic: Into ebulalayo noma evimbela ukukhula kwamagciwane
igciwane: I-ejenti ethelelanayo ephindaphinda kuphela ngaphakathi kwamaseli wento ephilayo ephethe
umgomo: Ukulungiswa kwezinto eziphilayo okunikeza ukungatheleleki esifweni esithile
isimiso sezinzwa: Inethiwekhi yamaseli akhethekile adlulisela ulwazi kuwo wonke umzimba
uhlelo lwe-endocrine: Uhlelo lwezindlala ezikhiqiza amahomoni alawula imisebenzi ehlukahlukene yomzimba
uhlelo lokujikeleza kwegazi: Uhlelo lwezitho nemithambo ehambisa igazi emzimbeni wonke
Amasosha omzimba: Uhlelo lwamaseli nezitho ezivikela umzimba ezifweni
ukuziphendukela kwemvelo: Isici esinikeza ukusinda noma inzuzo yokuzala entweni ephilayo endaweni yayo
speciation: Inqubo lapho uhlobo olusha oluvela khona ohlotsheni olukhona
